articles.description: Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz moves into the French Open final after Italian opponent Lorenzo Musetti retires injured in their semi-final.
articles.content:

articles.title: Boy lost balance before falling from cliff edge
articles.description: A 12-year-old boy lost his balance after slipping in a puddle close to the edge of the Cliffs of Moher before falling over the edge to his death, an inquest has heard as it returned a verdict of accidental death.
